channel.title: A simple problem anyone can fix
channel.description:
Alright, I'm troubled. How do you login to your server. I have my No-IP running, everythings OK. BUT... I forgot how to login to my server. Do I start the mopar runbot, then the server, type in my no IP for new server, the server port, then start server? I tried that and it doesn't work.
Also, if it helps. My Moparscape folder and server folder are in the same folder in My Documents. Do I have to change that to work? Please help... if you're smart that is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 06:34:33 PM[/size][hr]Oh, and I have the new JDK update. Can I have a couple codes to go with the compiler and runbot?

item.title: A simple problem anyone can fix
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Compiler:

@echo off

javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -classpath . *.java -g

pause

Run.bat:
@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
echo Restarting server
title Your server name here
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: A simple problem anyone can fix
